summary: Request to implement support for a RawValue payload wrapper that allows converters to skip conversion and pass values unchanged, similar to the feature being added across Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users need a way to work with raw payload values that bypass automatic conversion when needed.
proposedFix: Implement a simple payload wrapper that signals converters to skip conversion, as defined in the cross-SDK feature specification.
keyQuote: need a simple payload wrapper that tells converters not to apply conversion
